results.name: Heroes of Might and Magic 3: The Restoration of Erathia

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit RAM - 3 GB, Keyboard and mouse required

7 / 8 / 10 (64-bit)
Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo 2.0+ GHz or an equivalent AMD CPU
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or AMD Radeon HD2900 XT (with 512MB VRAM)
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive Space 3 GB
Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse required, Microsoft Xbox 360 controller optional

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4160 @ 3.6GHz/AMD FX 8350 @ 4.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050/AMD RX 560 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: Estimated for 1080p 60fps at medium settings
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8400 @ 2.8GHz/AMD Ryzen 5 2600 @ 3.4GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070/AMD RX 590 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: Estimated for 1080p and higher, 60fps with high or epic settings

requirements_en.minimum:
